abstract: Herman Cain's humor distinguishes him from rivals in hunt for Republican presidential nomination, but not all of his attempts at comedy succeed.
snippet: No candidate today is as daring as Herman Cain when it comes to charming an audience with silky silliness, but not all of Mr. Cain’s attempts at comedy succeed.
lead_paragraph: No candidate today is as daring as Herman Cain when it comes to charming an audience with silky silliness, but not all of Mr. Cain’s attempts at comedy succeed.

headline.main: Behind Cain’s Humor, a Question of Seriousness
headline.print_headline: Behind Cain’s Humor, a Question of Seriousness
headline.seo: Behind Herman Cain’s Humor, a Question of Seriousness
